content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Emilia Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for the apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The potential tenant, Emilia Müller, repeatedly expressed that the proposed rental prices were not high enough for her expectations or desires.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Emilia Müller, as 7. There were disagreements regarding the rental price, but the conversation remained respectful and polite.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. The potential tenant, Emilia Müller, maintained a respectful and polite demeanor throughout the negotiation process, despite our disagreement on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt
